channel.title: Blackmesa won´t work even with source SDK base 2007
channel.description: I want to play this game so bad but it wont start :'( I downloaded source SDK base 2007 and even 2006 with steam but is still wont work :frowning: whenever i press play on blackmesa on steam it loads for a few seconds and then i see a small blacksreen foor a brief second and than nothing happens > :frowning: PLEASE HELP ME I`M SO DESPRETE TO PLAY THIS AWESOME GAME!

item.title: Blackmesa won´t work even with source SDK base 2007
item.dc:creator: Hyperbyte
item.description:
xalener:

Lots of research and even more money.

You know, if you don’t want to help people, then please stay away from the help/bug reporting sections of the forums. There is no need to troll threads with crappy replies like above.

benderisgreat34, please see these threads:
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=13663
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=495973

In short, it’s a technical issue which cannot be easily worked around. What you can do is play the game on another computer with a different processor than an AMD Athlon, or wait until the developers release a fix. That is, assuming they release a fix.

Read full topic

item.description:
sersoft:

Sorry, AMD Athlons don’t have the required instruction sets to run BM.

anyway i can fix that?
